                                  # 06ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ“ä½œï¼ˆJPQL / SQLï¼‰

                                  åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬ç»è¿‡äº†ä¸Šé¢çš„å­¦ä¹ ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šå‘ç°ä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼šé‚£å°±æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰€æ”¯æŒçš„å°±æ˜¯ä¸€äº›ç®€å•çš„å¢åˆ æŸ¥æ”¹ç­‰ç­‰çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œå¯¹äºå¤æ‚çš„ä¸€äº›æ“ä½œå¹¶ä¸æ”¯æŒï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œä¸€äº›è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡SQLæˆ–è€… JPQLè¿›è¡Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰æ“ä½œï¼

                                  # 1ã€JPQLï¼ˆåŸç”ŸSQLï¼‰

                                  • @Query

                                    • æŸ¥è¯¢å¦‚æœè¿”å›å•ä¸ªå®ä½“ï¼Œå°±ä½¿ç”¨pojoç±»è¿›è¡Œæ¥æ”¶å³å¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯å¤šä¸ªå°±ä½¿ç”¨listè¿›è¡Œæ¥æ”¶ï¼

                                    • å‚æ•°è®¾ç½®æ–¹å¼

                                      • ç´¢å¼•ï¼š?æ•°å­—
                                      • å…·åï¼š:å‚æ•°å ç»“åˆ@Paramæ³¨è§£æŒ‡å®šå‚æ•°åç§° |

                                    • å¢åˆ æ”¹ï¼š

                                      • è¦åŠ ä¸Šäº‹åŠ¡çš„æ”¯æŒï¼š
                                      • å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ’å…¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä¸€å®šåªèƒ½åœ¨hibernateä¸‹æ‰æ”¯æŒï¼ˆInsert into â€¦ selectï¼‰
                                      @Transactional // å¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡ï¼é€šå¸¸ä¼šæ”¾åœ¨ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å±‚ä¸Šå»å£°æ˜ï¼
@Modifying  // é€šçŸ¥springdatajpa æ˜¯å¢åˆ æ”¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼

                                  1. åˆ›å»ºrepository/CustomerRepository
                                  package com.yykk.repositories;

import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Modifying;
import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;
import org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository;
import org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;
import org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;

import java.util.List;

public interface CustomerRepositories extends PagingAndSortingRepository<Customer,Long>{

    // ä½¿ç”¨JPQLå®ç°å¢åˆ æ”¹æŸ¥

    // æŸ¥è¯¢
    //@Query("from Customer where custName=?1")
    @Query(value = "from Customer where custName=:custName")
    List<Customer> findCustomerByCustName(@Param("custName") String custName);

    /**
     *  æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œï¼
     *  åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰äº‹åŠ¡çš„æ”¯æŒï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼éœ€è¦å®šä¹‰åœ¨ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å±‚é‡Œé¢ï¼
     *  @Modifying  // é€šçŸ¥springdatajpa æ˜¯å¢åˆ æ”¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼
     */
    @Query("update Customer c set c.custName=:custName where c.id=:id")
    @Transactional // å¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡ï¼
    @Modifying  // é€šçŸ¥springdatajpa æ˜¯å¢åˆ æ”¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼
    int updateCustomerById(@Param("custName") String custName,@Param("id") Long id);

    // åˆ é™¤
    @Query("delete from Customer c  where c.id=?1")
    @Transactional // å¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡ï¼
    @Modifying  // é€šçŸ¥springdatajpa æ˜¯å¢åˆ æ”¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼
    String deleteCustomer(Long id);

    // æ–°å¢ JPQL é»˜è®¤æ˜¯ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨çš„ä¼ªæ’å…¥ï¼Œåº•å±‚æ˜¯hibernateï¼
    // é€šçŸ¥springdatajpa æ˜¯å¢åˆ æ”¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼
    //@Transactional // å¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡ï¼
    //@Modifying
    //@Query(value = "insert into Customer(custName) select cust_name from Customer where id=?1") //è¿™é‡Œæ¨èä½¿ç”¨å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•insertæ–¹æ³•ä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ï¼å¦‚æœè¦ä½¿ç”¨å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨åŸç”Ÿçš„ï¼è¿™é‡Œæ²¡æœ‰valuesæŠ¥é”™ï¼å¯ä»¥å°è¯•ä¸€ä¸‹æ‹¼æ¥ï¼
    //int insertCustomerBySelect(Long id);

    // åŸç”ŸSQLæŸ¥è¯¢
    // åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæŸ¥è¯¢ä¸­å†™æˆcustNameä¹‹åå°±æŠ¥é”™ï¼
    @Query(value = "select * FROM tb_Customer where cust_name= ? "
            ,nativeQuery = true)
    List<Customer> findCustomerByCustNameBySql(@Param("custName") String custName);

}
                                  1. æµ‹è¯•ï¼
                                  import com.yykk.config.SpringDataJPAConfig;
import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import com.yykk.repositories.CustomerRepositories;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;

import java.util.List;

@ContextConfiguration(classes = SpringDataJPAConfig.class)
@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
public class JPQLTest {

    @Autowired
    CustomerRepositories repositories;

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æµ‹è¯•ï¼
     * å› ä¸ºå¯èƒ½ä¼šé‡åˆ°è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœæ˜¯å¤šä¸ªç›¸åŒçš„ï¼Œå°±ä½¿ç”¨listæ¥æ”¶ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void testQuery() {
        List<Customer> customer = repositories.findCustomerByCustName("yykk");
        System.out.println(customer);
    }

    /**
     *  æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œï¼
     *  åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰äº‹åŠ¡çš„æ”¯æŒï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼éœ€è¦å®šä¹‰åœ¨ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å±‚é‡Œé¢ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void testUpdate() {
        int result = repositories.updateCustomerById("apple", 3L);
        System.out.println(result);
    }

    @Test
    public void testDelete() {
        String result = repositories.deleteCustomer( 9L);
        System.out.println(result);
    }

    //@Test
    //public void testInsert() {
    //    int result = repositories.insertCustomerBySelect(1L);
    //    System.out.println(result);
    //}

    @Test
    public void testQuery_sql() {

        List<Customer> list = repositories.findCustomerByCustNameBySql("yykk");
        System.out.println(list);
    }
}

                                  # 2ã€è§„å®šæ–¹æ³•å

                                  • åªæ”¯æŒæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ä¸»é¢˜å…³é”®å­—ï¼ˆå‰ç¼€ï¼‰

                                    • åªæœ‰æŸ¥è¯¢å’Œåˆ é™¤ï¼å†³å®šå½“å‰æ–¹æ³•ä½œç”¨ï¼

                                  • æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸»é¢˜å…³é”®å­—

                                  å…³é”®å­—æè¿°
                                  findâ€¦Byã€``readâ€¦Byã€getâ€¦Byã€query..Byã€searchâ€¦Byã€streamâ€¦By`é€šè¿‡æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•é€šå¸¸è¿”å›å­˜å‚¨åº“ç±»å‹ã€Collectionæˆ–Streamableå­ç±»å‹æˆ–ç»“æœåŒ…è£…å™¨ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šPageã€GeoResultsæˆ–ä»»ä½•å…¶ä»–ç‰¹å®šäºå•†åº—çš„ç»“æœåŒ…è£…å™¨ã€‚å¯ç”¨äº findByâ€¦ï¼ŒfindMyDomainTypeByâ€¦
                                  existsâ€¦Byå­˜åœ¨æŠ•å½±ï¼Œé€šå¸¸è¿”å› booleanç»“æœ
                                  countâ€¦Byè®¡æ•°æŠ•å½±è¿”å›æ•°å­—ç»“æœã€‚
                                  deleteâ€¦Byã€removeâ€¦Byåˆ é™¤æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•è¿”å›æ— ç»“æœï¼ˆvoidï¼‰æˆ–åˆ é™¤è®¡æ•°ã€‚
                                  â€¦First<number>â€¦ï¼Œâ€¦Top<number>â€¦å°†æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœé™åˆ¶ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª<number>ç»“æœã€‚æ­¤å…³é”®å­—å¯ä»¥å‡ºç°åœ¨ä¸»é¢˜çš„findï¼ˆå’Œå…¶ä»–å…³é”®å­—ï¼‰å’Œä¹‹é—´çš„ä»»ä½•ä½ç½® byã€‚
                                  â€¦Distinctâ€¦ä½¿ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„æŸ¥è¯¢ä»…è¿”å›å”¯ä¸€çš„ç»“æœã€‚æŸ¥è¯¢ç‰¹å®šä¸å•†åº—çš„æ–‡æ¡£æ˜¯å¦æ”¯æŒè¯¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚æ­¤å…³é”®å­—å¯ä»¥å‡ºç°åœ¨ä¸»é¢˜çš„ find ï¼ˆå’Œå…¶ä»–å…³é”®å­—ï¼‰å’Œä¹‹é—´çš„ä»»æ„ä½ç½® byã€‚
                                  • æ”¯æŒçš„æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•è°“è¯å…³é”®å­—å’Œä¿®é¥°ç¬¦

                                  KeywordSampleJPQL snippet
                                  AndfindByNameAndPwdwhere name= ? and pwd =?
                                  OrfindByNameOrSexwhere name= ? or sex=?
                                  Is,EqualsfindById,findByIdEqualswhere id= ?
                                  BetweenfindByIdBetweenwhere id between ? and ?
                                  LessThanfindByIdLessThanwhere id < ?
                                  LessThanEqualsfindByIdLessThanEqualswhere id <= ?
                                  GreaterThanfindByIdGreaterThanwhere id > ?
                                  GreaterThanEqualsfindByIdGreaterThanEqualswhere id > = ?
                                  AfterfindByIdAfterwhere id > ?
                                  BeforefindByIdBeforewhere id < ?
                                  IsNullfindByNameIsNullwhere name is null
                                  isNotNull,NotNullfindByNameNotNullwhere name is not null
                                  LikefindByNameLikewhere name like ?
                                  NotLikefindByNameNotLikewhere name not like ?
                                  StartingWithfindByNameStartingWithwhere name like â€˜?%â€™
                                  EndingWithfindByNameEndingWithwhere name like â€˜%?â€™
                                  ContainingfindByNameContainingwhere name like â€˜%?%â€™
                                  OrderByfindByIdOrderByXDescwhere id=? order by x desc
                                  NotfindByNameNotwhere name <> ?
                                  InfindByIdIn(Collection<?> c)where id in (?)
                                  NotInfindByIdNotIn(Collection<?> c)where id not in (?)
                                  TRUEfindByAaaTuewhere aaa = true
                                  FALSEfindByAaaFalsewhere aaa = false
                                  IgnoreCasefindByNameIgnoreCasewhere UPPER(name)=UPPER(?)
                                  topfindTop10top 10/where ROWNUM <=10
                                  DistinctfindDistinctByLastnameAndFirstnameselect distinct â€¦ where x.lastname = ?1 and x.firstname = ?2

                                  1ã€repository/CustomerMethodNameRepositories

                                  package com.yykk.repositories;

import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Modifying;
import org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository;
import org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;

import java.util.List;

public interface CustomerMethodNameRepositories extends PagingAndSortingRepository<Customer,Long>{

    List<Customer> findByCustName(String custName);

    boolean existsByCustName(String custName);

    @Transactional
    @Modifying
    int deleteByid(Long id);

    List<Customer> findByCustNameLike(String custName);

}

                                  2ã€æµ‹è¯•ï¼

                                  import com.yykk.config.SpringDataJPAConfig;
import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import com.yykk.repositories.CustomerMethodNameRepositories;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;

import java.util.List;

@ContextConfiguration(classes = SpringDataJPAConfig.class)
@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
public class MethodName {

    @Autowired
    CustomerMethodNameRepositories repository;

    @Test
    public void list(){
        List<Customer> list = repository.findByCustName("yykk");
        System.out.println(list);
    }

    @Test
    public void exists(){
        boolean exists = repository.existsByCustName("yykk");
        System.out.println(exists);
    }

    @Test
    public void delete(){
        int del = repository.deleteByid(12L);
        System.out.println(del);
    }

    @Test
    public void like(){
        List<Customer> list = repository.findByCustNameLike("y%");
        System.out.println(list);
    }
}

                                  # 3ã€é€šè¿‡Query by Example

                                  • åªæ”¯æŒæŸ¥è¯¢
                                    • ä¸æ”¯æŒåµŒå¥—æˆ–åˆ†ç»„çš„å±æ€§çº¦æŸï¼Œå¦‚firstname = ï¼Ÿ0 orï¼ˆfirstname = ï¼Ÿ 1 and lastname = ï¼Ÿ 2ï¼‰
                                    • åªæ”¯æŒå­—ç¬¦ä¸² start/contains/ends/regex åŒ¹é…å’Œå…¶ä»–å±æ€§ç±»å‹çš„ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…ã€‚

                                  å®ç°ï¼š

                                  1ã€å°†Repositoryç»§æ‰¿QueryByExampleExecutor

                                  package com.yykk.repositories;

import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository;
import org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor;

public interface CustomerQBERepositories extends PagingAndSortingRepository<Customer, Long>
        , QueryByExampleExecutor<Customer> {

}

                                  2ã€æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç ï¼

                                  import com.yykk.config.SpringDataJPAConfig;
import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import com.yykk.repositories.CustomerQBERepositories;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.data.domain.Example;
import org.springframework.data.domain.ExampleMatcher;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;

@ContextConfiguration(classes = SpringDataJPAConfig.class)
@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
public class QueryByExampleExecutor {

    @Autowired
    CustomerQBERepositories repository;

    /**
     * ç®€å•å®ä¾‹ï¼šå®¢æˆ·åç§°ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·åœ°å€åŠ¨æ€æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void list() {
        Customer customer = new Customer();
        customer.setCustName("yykk");
        customer.setCustAddress("ä¸Šæµ·");

        // é€šè¿‡ Exampleæ„é€ æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶ï¼
        Example<Customer> example = Example.of(customer);

        Iterable<Customer> all = repository.findAll(example);
        System.out.println(all);
    }

    /**
     * é€šè¿‡åŒ¹é…å™¨ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œæ¡ä»¶çš„é™åˆ¶ï¼
     * ç®€å•å®ä¾‹ï¼šå®¢æˆ·åç§°ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·åœ°å€åŠ¨æ€æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void test() {
        Customer customer = new Customer();
        customer.setCustName("kk");
        customer.setCustAddress("HAI");

        // é€šè¿‡åŒ¹é…å™¨å¯¹æ¡ä»¶è¡Œä¸ºè¿›è¡Œè®¾ç½®ï¼
        ExampleMatcher matcher = ExampleMatcher.matching()
                .withIgnorePaths("custName")  // è®¾ç½®å¿½ç•¥çš„å±æ€§ï¼
                //.withIgnoreCase("cust_address")   // è®¾ç½®å¿½ç•¥å¤§å°å†™ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸å†™å°±æ˜¯å…¨éƒ¨å±æ€§çš„è®¾ç½®ï¼
                //.withStringMatcher(ExampleMatcher.StringMatcher.ENDING); // å¯¹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¿›è¡Œç»“å°¾åŒ¹é…
                .withMatcher("cust_address",m -> m.endsWith().ignoreCase(true));  // é’ˆå¯¹å•ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œè®¾ç½®,ä¼šä½¿withIgnoreCaseå¤±æ•ˆï¼
                //.withMatcher("custAddress", ExampleMatcher.GenericPropertyMatchers.endsWith());
        // é€šè¿‡ Exampleæ„é€ æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶ï¼
        Example<Customer> example = Example.of(customer,matcher);

        Iterable<Customer> list = repository.findAll(example);
        System.out.println(list);
    }


}

                                  # 4ã€é€šè¿‡Specifications

                                  ä¹‹å‰ä½¿ç”¨Query by Exampleåªèƒ½é’ˆå¯¹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¿›è¡Œæ¡ä»¶è®¾ç½®ï¼Œé‚£å¦‚æœå¸Œæœ›å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰ç±»å‹æ”¯æŒï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨Specifcations

                                  å®ç°

                                  1ã€ç»§æ‰¿æ¥å£

                                  package com.yykk.repositories;

import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor;
import org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository;

public interface CustomerSpecificationsRepositories extends PagingAndSortingRepository<Customer,Long>
        ,JpaSpecificationExecutor<Customer> {
    
}
                                  • rootï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢å“ªä¸ªè¡¨ï¼ˆå…³è”æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼‰= from
                                  • CriteriaQueryï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢å“ªäº›å­—æ®µï¼Œæ’åºæ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ = ç»„åˆï¼ˆorder by ã€whereï¼‰
                                  • CriteriaBuilderï¼šæ¡ä»¶ä¹‹é—´æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆå…³ç³»ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªæŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆç±»å‹ï¼ˆ> between in â€¦ï¼‰= where
                                  • Predicateï¼ˆExpressionï¼‰ï¼šæ¯ä¸€æ¡æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶çš„è¯¦ç»†æè¿°

                                  2ã€æµ‹è¯•ï¼

                                  import com.yykk.config.SpringDataJPAConfig;
import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import com.yykk.repositories.CustomerSpecificationsRepositories;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;
import org.springframework.util.StringUtils;

import javax.persistence.EntityManager;
import javax.persistence.criteria.*;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

@ContextConfiguration(classes = SpringDataJPAConfig.class)
@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
public class SpecificationsTest {

    @Autowired
    CustomerSpecificationsRepositories repository;

    @Autowired
    EntityManager entityManager;

    @Test
    public void test_All(){
        List<Customer> customer = repository.findAll(new Specification<Customer>() {
            @Override
            public Predicate toPredicate(Root<Customer> root, CriteriaQuery<?> query, CriteriaBuilder criteriaBuilder) {

                // root from Customer ,è·å–åˆ—
                // CriteriaBuilder è®¾ç½®å„ç§æ¡ä»¶ (< > in ...)
                // query ç»„åˆ(order by ,where )

                return null;
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å®¢æˆ·èŒƒå›´ï¼ˆinï¼‰
     * id > å¤§äº
     * åœ°å€ï¼šç²¾ç¡®
     */
    @Test
    public void test_Coll(){
        List<Customer> customer = repository.findAll(new Specification<Customer>() {
            @Override
            public Predicate toPredicate(Root<Customer> root, CriteriaQuery<?> query, CriteriaBuilder criteriaBuilder) {

                // root from Customer ,è·å–åˆ—
                // CriteriaBuilder è®¾ç½®å„ç§æ¡ä»¶ (< > in ...)
                // query ç»„åˆ(order by ,where )

                Path<Long> id = root.get("id");
                Path<String> custName = root.get("custName");
                Path<String> custAddress = root.get("custAddress");

                // å‚æ•°1ï¼šä¸ºå“ªä¸ªå­—æ®µè®¾ç½®æ¡ä»¶    å‚æ•°2ï¼šå€¼
                Predicate address = criteriaBuilder.equal(custAddress, "SHANGHAI");
                Predicate ids = criteriaBuilder.greaterThan(id, 0L);
                CriteriaBuilder.In<String> in = criteriaBuilder.in(custName);
                in.value("yykk").value("å¼ ä¸‰");

                Predicate predicate = criteriaBuilder.and(address, ids,in);

                return predicate;
            }
        });
        System.out.println(customer);
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å®¢æˆ·èŒƒå›´ï¼ˆinï¼‰
     * id > å¤§äº
     * åœ°å€ï¼šç²¾ç¡®
     * å°†è¿™é‡Œçš„å€¼è®¾ç½®ä¸ºåŠ¨æ€çš„ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void test_dynamic(){

        Customer params = new Customer();
        params.setId(0L);
        params.setCustAddress("SHANGHAI");
        params.setCustName("yykk,apple");

        List<Customer> customer = repository.findAll(new Specification<Customer>() {
            @Override
            public Predicate toPredicate(Root<Customer> root, CriteriaQuery<?> query, CriteriaBuilder criteriaBuilder) {

                // root from Customer ,è·å–åˆ—
                // CriteriaBuilder è®¾ç½®å„ç§æ¡ä»¶ (< > in ...)
                // query ç»„åˆ(order by ,where )

                Path<Long> id = root.get("id");
                Path<String> custName = root.get("custName");
                Path<String> custAddress = root.get("custAddress");

                // å‚æ•°1ï¼šä¸ºå“ªä¸ªå­—æ®µè®¾ç½®æ¡ä»¶    å‚æ•°2ï¼šå€¼
                List<Predicate> list = new ArrayList<>();
                if (StringUtils.isEmpty(params.getCustAddress())) {
                    list.add(criteriaBuilder.equal(custAddress, "SHANGHAI"));
                }
                if (params.getId() > -1) {
                    list.add(criteriaBuilder.greaterThan(id, 0L));
                }
                if (StringUtils.isEmpty(params.getCustName())) {
                    CriteriaBuilder.In<String> in = criteriaBuilder.in(custName);
                    in.value("yykk").value("å¼ ä¸‰");
                    list.add(in);
                }

                Predicate predicate = criteriaBuilder.and(list.toArray(new Predicate[list.size()]));

                return predicate;
            }
        });
        System.out.println(customer);
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å®¢æˆ·èŒƒå›´ï¼ˆinï¼‰
     * id > å¤§äº
     * åœ°å€ï¼šç²¾ç¡®
     * å°†è¿™é‡Œçš„å€¼è®¾ç½®ä¸ºåŠ¨æ€çš„ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void test_dynamicx(){

        CriteriaBuilder builder = entityManager.getCriteriaBuilder();
        CriteriaQuery<Object> query = builder.createQuery();
        Root<Customer> root = query.from(Customer.class);

        Customer params = new Customer();
        params.setId(0L);
        params.setCustAddress("SHANGHAI");
        params.setCustName("yykk,apple");

        List<Customer> customer = repository.findAll(new Specification<Customer>() {
            @Override
            public Predicate toPredicate(Root<Customer> root, CriteriaQuery<?> query, CriteriaBuilder criteriaBuilder) {

                // root from Customer ,è·å–åˆ—
                // CriteriaBuilder è®¾ç½®å„ç§æ¡ä»¶ (< > in ...)
                // query ç»„åˆ(order by ,where )

                // 1ã€é€šè¿‡rootæ‹¿åˆ°éœ€è¦è®¾ç½®æ¡ä»¶çš„å­—æ®µ
                Path<Long> id = root.get("id");
                Path<String> custName = root.get("custName");
                Path<String> custAddress = root.get("custAddress");

                // 2ã€é€šè¿‡CriteriaBuilderè®¾ç½®ä¸åŒçš„ç±»å‹æ¡ä»¶
                List<Predicate> list = new ArrayList<>();
                if (StringUtils.isEmpty(params.getCustAddress())) {
                    // å‚æ•°1ï¼šä¸ºå“ªä¸ªå­—æ®µè®¾ç½®æ¡ä»¶    å‚æ•°2ï¼šå€¼
                    list.add(criteriaBuilder.equal(custAddress, "SHANGHAI"));
                }
                if (params.getId() > -1) {
                    list.add(criteriaBuilder.greaterThan(id, 0L));
                }
                if (StringUtils.isEmpty(params.getCustName())) {
                    CriteriaBuilder.In<String> in = criteriaBuilder.in(custName);
                    in.value("yykk").value("å¼ ä¸‰");
                    list.add(in);
                }

                // 3ã€ç»„åˆæ¡ä»¶ï¼
                Predicate predicate = criteriaBuilder.and(list.toArray(new Predicate[list.size()]));

                Order desc = criteriaBuilder.desc(id);
                return query.where(predicate).orderBy(desc).getRestriction();
            }
        });
        System.out.println(customer);
    }

}

                                  é™åˆ¶ï¼šä¸èƒ½åˆ†ç»„ã€èšåˆå‡½æ•°ï¼Œéœ€è¦è‡ªå·±é€šè¿‡entityManagerï¼

                                  # 5ã€é€šè¿‡Querydsl

                                  å®˜ç½‘ï¼šhttp://querydsl.com/open in new window

                                  Githubï¼šhttps://github.com/querydsl/querydslopen in new window

                                  ä¸­æ–‡æ–‡æ¡£ï¼šhttps://github.com/wjw465150/Querydsl-Reference-Guide-Chinese-versionopen in new window

                                  Querydsl æ˜¯åŸºäºORMæ¡†æ¶æˆ–SQLå¹³å°ä¸Šçš„ä¸€ä¸ªé€šç”¨æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡†æ¶ã€‚å€ŸåŠ©äºQuerydslå¯ä»¥åœ¨ä»»ä½•æ”¯æŒçš„ORMæ¡†æ¶æˆ–è€…SQLå¹³å°ä¸Šä»¥é€šç”¨APIæ–¹å¼æ„å»ºæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼

                                  JPAæ˜¯QueryDSLçš„ä¸»è¦é›†æˆæŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œæ˜¯JPQLå’ŒCriteriaæŸ¥è¯¢çš„æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ç›®å‰QueryDSLæ”¯æŒçš„å¹³å°åŒ…æ‹¬JPAã€JDOã€SQLã€MongoDBç­‰ç­‰ï¼

                                  QueryDSLæ‰©å±•è®©æˆ‘ä»¬ä»¥é“¾å¼æ–¹å¼ç¼–å†™æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ã€‚è¯¥æ‰©å±•éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£QueryDslPredicateExecutorï¼Œå®ƒå®šä¹‰äº†å¾ˆå¤šæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

                                  1ã€æ¥å£ç»§æ‰¿äº†è¯¥æ¥å£ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æä¾›çš„å„ç§æ–¹æ³•äº†ï¼

                                  package com.yykk.repositories;

import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import org.springframework.data.querydsl.QuerydslPredicateExecutor;
import org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository;

public interface CustomerQueryDSLRepositories extends PagingAndSortingRepository<Customer,Long>
        , QuerydslPredicateExecutor<Customer> {

}

  </plugins>

                                  JPAAnnotationProcessor æŸ¥æ‰¾ä½¿ç”¨ javax.persistence.Entity æ³¨è§£çš„å®ä½“ç±»å¹¶ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬ç”ŸæˆæŸ¥è¯¢ç±»ã€‚

                                  å¦‚æœæ‚¨åœ¨å®ä½“ç±»ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ Hibernate æ³¨è§£ï¼Œåˆ™åº”æ”¹ç”¨ APT å¤„ç†å™¨ com.querydsl.apt.hibernate.HibernateAnnotationProcessorã€‚

                                  è¿è¡Œmaven clean installï¼Œæ‚¨å°†å¾—åˆ°ç”Ÿæˆçš„æŸ¥è¯¢ç±»åˆ° target/generated-sources/javaç›®å½•ä¸‹ã€‚

                                  å¦‚æœæ‚¨ä½¿ç”¨ Eclipseï¼Œè¯·è¿è¡Œ mvn eclipse:eclipse æ¥æ›´æ–°æ‚¨çš„ Eclipse é¡¹ç›®ä»¥åŒ…å« target/generated-sources/java ä½œä¸ºæºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ã€‚

                                  ç®€å•ç†è§£ï¼šæ‰“å¼€IDEAçš„é¡¹ç›®å·¥ç¨‹ï¼Œå°†æˆ‘ä»¬ç”Ÿæˆçš„Qç±»è®¾ç½®ä¸ºSourcesèµ„æºç±»ï¼

                                  4ã€æµ‹è¯•ï¼

                                  import com.querydsl.core.Tuple;
import com.querydsl.core.types.dsl.BooleanExpression;
import com.querydsl.jpa.impl.JPAQuery;
import com.querydsl.jpa.impl.JPAQueryFactory;
import com.yykk.config.SpringDataJPAConfig;
import com.yykk.pojo.Customer;
import com.yykk.pojo.QCustomer;
import com.yykk.repositories.CustomerQueryDSLRepositories;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;
import org.springframework.util.StringUtils;

import javax.persistence.EntityManager;
import javax.persistence.PersistenceContext;
import java.util.List;

@ContextConfiguration(classes = SpringDataJPAConfig.class)
@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
public class QueryDSLTest {

    @Autowired
    CustomerQueryDSLRepositories repository;

    // è§£å†³çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨é—®é¢˜ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äºAutowiredï¼@Beané»˜è®¤æ˜¯å•ä¾‹çš„ï¼ŒJPAå°±æœ‰çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨é—®é¢˜ï¼
    @PersistenceContext
    EntityManager entityManager;


    @Test
    public void test_All(){
        QCustomer customer = QCustomer.customer;

        // é€šè¿‡idæŸ¥æ‰¾
        BooleanExpression eq = customer.id.eq(1L);
        System.out.println(repository.findOne(eq));
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å®¢æˆ·èŒƒå›´ï¼ˆinï¼‰
     * id > å¤§äº
     * åœ°å€ï¼šç²¾ç¡®
     */
    @Test
    public void test_demo(){
        QCustomer customer = QCustomer.customer;

        // é€šè¿‡idæŸ¥æ‰¾
        BooleanExpression and = customer.custName.in("yykk","apple")
                        .and(customer.id.gt(0L))
                        .and(customer.custAddress.eq("SHANGHAI"));
        System.out.println(repository.findOne(and));
    }


    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å®¢æˆ·èŒƒå›´ï¼ˆinï¼‰
     * id > å¤§äº
     * åœ°å€ï¼šç²¾ç¡®
     * æµ‹è¯•åŠ¨æ€çš„ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void test(){

        Customer params = new Customer();
        params.setId(0L);
        params.setCustAddress("SHANGHAI");
        params.setCustName("yykk");

        QCustomer customer = QCustomer.customer;

        // åˆå§‹æ¡ä»¶ ç±»ä¼¼äº1=1ï¼Œæ°¸è¿œéƒ½æˆç«‹ï¼
        BooleanExpression expression = customer.isNotNull().or(customer.isNull());

        expression = params.getId() > -1 ?
                expression.and(customer.id.gt(params.getId())) : expression;

        expression = !StringUtils.isEmpty(params.getCustName()) ?
                expression.and(customer.custName.in(params.getCustName().split(","))) : expression;

        expression = !StringUtils.isEmpty(params.getCustAddress()) ?
                expression.and(customer.custAddress.in(params.getCustAddress())) : expression;

        System.out.println(repository.findAll(expression));
    }

    /**
     * è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ—æŸ¥è¯¢ã€åˆ†ç»„
     * éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨åŸç”Ÿæ€çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼(Specification)
     */
    @Test
    public void test_customize(){
        JPAQueryFactory factory = new JPAQueryFactory(entityManager);

        QCustomer customer = QCustomer.customer;

        // select id,custName from ...
        // æ„å»ºåŸºäºQueryDslçš„æŸ¥è¯¢
        JPAQuery<Tuple> tupleJPAQuery = factory.select(customer.id, customer.custName)
                .from(customer)
                .where(customer.id.eq(1L))
                .orderBy(customer.id.desc());

        // æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢
        List<Tuple> fetch = tupleJPAQuery.fetch();

        // å¤„ç†è¿”å›æ•°æ®
        for (Tuple tuple : fetch) {
            System.out.println(tuple.get(customer.id));
            System.out.println(tuple.get(customer.custName));
        }
    }

    /**
     * è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ—æŸ¥è¯¢ã€åˆ†ç»„
     * éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨åŸç”Ÿæ€çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼(Specification)
     * é€šè¿‡Repositoryè¿›è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œåˆ—ã€è¡¨éƒ½æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„ï¼
     */
    @Test
    public void test_customize_list(){
        JPAQueryFactory factory = new JPAQueryFactory(entityManager);

        QCustomer customer = QCustomer.customer;

        // select id,custName from ...
        // æ„å»ºåŸºäºQueryDslçš„æŸ¥è¯¢
        JPAQuery<Long> longJPAQuery = factory.select(customer.id.sum())
                .from(customer)
                //.where(customer.id.eq(1L))
                .orderBy(customer.id.desc());

        // æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢
        List<Long> fetch = longJPAQuery.fetch();

        // å¤„ç†è¿”å›æ•°æ®
        for (Long tuple : fetch) {
            System.out.println(tuple);
        }
    }
}
